abstract: Rescuers searched a Moroccan hillside lake on Sunday for the head of the world’s largest sovereign fund, the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority, two days after his plane crashed into it.
snippet: Rescuers searched a Moroccan hillside lake on Sunday for the head of the world’s largest sovereign fund, the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority, two days after his plane crashed into it.
lead_paragraph: Rescuers searched a Moroccan hillside lake on Sunday for the head of the world’s largest sovereign fund, the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority, two days after his plane crashed into it, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Search Continues for Head of Abu Dhabi Fund
